Package vwr.project.services.graphics

Class Summary
DrawManager Draw Manager initializes the GL parameters, then it uses lists of sprites, elements, and text things that it draws once a frame, then clears* the lists.
DrawService allows limited access to various functions in DrawManager
Element Element is an abstract class that encompasses all elements.
ElementLine A primitive that represents a line.
ElementTriangle A primitive triangle.
PointColor Points to be used by elements.
Sprite Draws a single texture.
Textbit A string of text to be rendered with GL.
